title: Tribute Letter to Tupac Shakur
lyrics:
2 Contributors
Tribute Letter to Tupac Shakur Lyrics
Famous Compton rapper Kendrick Lamar penned a tribute letter to the late, famous rapper and global icon Tupac Shakur. The letter honored his late idol on the 19th Anniversary of his death in 1996. The letter… Read More 
I was 8 yrs old when I first saw you. I couldn’t describe how I felt at that moment. So many emotions. Full of excitement. Full of joy and eagerness.
 20 yrs later I understand exactly what that feeling was
INSPIRED

The people that you touched on that small intersection changed lives forever. I told myself I wanted to be a voice for man one day. Whoever knew I was speaking out loud for u to listen

Thank you
K.L
September 13, 2015
